1.1.0.name: wordpress/simple-seo-slideshow
1.1.0.description:
Simple SEO Slideshow is a plugin/widget, for displaying on your site the images of a gallery from specified post or page.

Widget options

  • Title
  • Page/Post ID
  • Delay until next slide
  • Height of your slideshow
  • Show or not navigation bullets
  • Show or not navigation arrows
  • Show or not the caption
  • Bullets Position
  • Caption Position
  • Exclude Images
  • Randomize images order

New Features

Now there is an option to randomize the order of the images.

You can exclude image from the slideshow.

You can use a shortcode to insert a slideshow of the gallery images of the post/page. You can also specify all the parameters of the widget. ex. [simpleslideshow sctitle="page title" scdelay=8 scheight=818 scdisplaybul=yes scdisplayarr=yes scdisplaycap=yes scbulpos=top-center sccappos=bottom-center]

We have made a plugin for the editor to make your life e
